T02TD1320E:247a-1: tra yod sha a'atma ku ru kul+le s'a dha nam /
T02TD1320E:247a-3: myur mdzad ma'i sgrub thabs bcu gsum pa'i bdag nyid /
T02TD1320E:247a-4: lha mo ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1320E:247a-5: ku ru kul+le'i rtog pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1320E:247a-6: re zhig dang por sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na /
T02TD1320E:247a-7: de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD1320E:247a-8: bris sku'i cho ga rab tu bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1320E:247a-9: gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa tva ra na bzhis brgyan pa /
T02TD1320E:247a-10: de'i dbus su ku ru kul+le dri bar bya ste /
T02TD1320E:247a-11: sku mdog dmar po phyag brgyad pa /
T02TD1320E:247a-12: dang po'i phyag gnyis kyis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings pa /
T02TD1320E:247a-13: g-yas kyi phyag na lcags kyu dang /
T02TD1320E:247a-16: g-yon pa'i phyag na zhags pa dang /
T02TD1320E:247a-19: shar du zhu ba'i sgrol ma bri /
T02TD1320E:247a-20: lhor grub pa'i sgrol ma bri /
T02TD1320E:247a-21: byang du snyan sgrol ma bri /
T02TD1320E:247b-0: me'i phyogs su gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrol @247b ma /
T02TD1320E:247b-1: srin po'i phyogs su rab tu snang ba'i sgrol ma /
T02TD1320E:247b-2: rlung gi phyogs su dpa' bo'i sgrol ma /
T02TD1320E:247b-3: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su skul byed ma bri'o //
T02TD1320E:247b-4: lha ma 'di rnams ni sku mdog dmar po /
T02TD1320E:247b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa lngas dbu brgyan pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-6: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyag bzhi pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-7: g-yas pa'i phyag mchog sbyin pa dang mda' 'gengs pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-8: g-yon pa'i phyag na autpala dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1320E:247b-9: shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje ro langs ma gsus khyim che ba 'jigs pa'i zhal lce 'jib pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-10: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-11: phyag g-yas na sdigs mdzub dang lcags kyu dang /
T02TD1320E:247b-12: g-yon na rdo rje dril bu dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-14: lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje phag mo gsus khyim che ba /
T02TD1320E:247b-15: skra gyen du brdzes pa'i 'jigs pa'i zhal lce 'jib pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-16: sku mdog dmar po rin chen 'byung ldan gyis dbu brgyan pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-17: phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang lcags kyu /
T02TD1320E:247b-18: g-yon dril bu dang zhags pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-20: nub phyogs kyi sgor ral gcig ma skra thor tshugs su bcings pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-22: ma mchu tshems kyis mnan pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-23: snang ba mtha' yas kyis dbu brgyan pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-24: phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang lcags kyu /
T02TD1320E:247b-25: g-yon na rdo rje dang dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-27: byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje dbyangs len ma /
T02TD1320E:247b-28: don yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02TD1320E:247b-29: zhal 'jigs pa gsus khyim che ba /
T02TD1320E:247b-30: phyag g-yas na ral gri dang lcags kyu /
T02TD1320E:247b-31: g-yon na rdo rje dril bu dang zhags pa zhabs g-yas brkyang ba'i bdag nyid sku bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1320E:247b-32: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1320E:247b-33: 'di rnams bsgom pa'i rim pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku de bzhin du rab tu bstan te /
T02TD1320E:247b-34: de la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge hr'i: dmar po las yongs su grub par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1320E:247b-35: kha dog dmar po mos par gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung du 'dug par dmigs par bya ste /
T02TD1320E:247b-36: bdag gi 'od zer rnams kyis 'jig rten gsum gang bar bya ste /
T02TD1320E:247b-37: yi ge yam sngon po las yongs su gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan pa de'i steng du bsbrub [*bsgrub] bya bzhag na dbang du byed do //
T02TD1320E:247b-38: 'jig rten gsum yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1320E:248a-1: rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar gyur pa ni /
T02TD1320E:248a-2: lag mthil gnyis rgyab sbyar te /
T02TD1320E:248a-3: srin lag gnyis mdud pa bcing /
T02TD1320E:248a-4: mthe'u chung dang gung mo dang /
T02TD1320E:248a-6: mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar byas pa 'di dpral ba'i gnas su gzhag pa ni 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1320E:248a-7: 'di ltar bsgom pa'i dus su gsang sngags bzlas pa ni /
T02TD1320E:248a-8: aom ku ru kul+le h'um hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1320E:248a-9: khrir bzlas brjod byas na 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1320E:248a-11: 'bum gyis rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1320E:248a-12: me tog autpala dang shing aarkas sbyin sreg byas na 'dod pa'i don 'thob po //
T02TD1320E:248a-14: ma du ba dang 'bras kyi lag pan gyis lan brgya stong du sbyin sreg byas na /
T02TD1320E:248a-15: rgyal po'i blon po yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1320E:248a-16: autpala stong gis blon po chen po yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1320E:248a-17: rtsi mar gyi mar me stong lha mo la phul bas rgyal pa yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1320E:248a-18: lha mo ku ru kul+le bdag nyid bcu gsum pa rdzogs so//
